CustomField.defaultValue: "DESTINATION THC IF NOT PREPAID: " & BR() & "SHUTTLING SERVICES WILL BE REQUIRED:" & BR() & "Note: Shuttling 3rd party & other additional local ancillary services rendered here will be subjected to GST 7%" & BR() & "Private apartments here require non refundable fees for lift usage of approx US$ 15.00 - 50.00 which we will invoice back at costs with supporting receipts."
CustomField.label: Destination Services
